name: Disco Cube Puzzler - Demo
description:
This is a puzzle game where you assume the role of a cube. You could say that you are part of a Rubik's cube that has come loose and is looking for a  way back to its place. On the way to the point of origin (the goal) you will encounter various obstacles that make it more difficult to get there.

This is a game that is meant for people of all ages who have a love for puzzles.

The game can be played with either Keyboard and mouse or (PS4 & Xbox) controller.

Made by:

Jonas Lundin

Kristian Svensson

Raimon Johvallius

Rasmus Hellkvist

David Hoang
